name: Pirobot
description:
You can controll this game by using W,A,S,D on your keyboard.

This Pirobot, a game all about a robot lost on a pirateship, he wants to escape but as soon as a human notices him on the ship.. his "life" would be over.

You have to escape the ship, and convince the humans via valid emotional interaction.

This game was developed for the Kenney Jam 2019 and is my first gamejam project.

This game was developed in about 8 hours.

Originaly i wanted to include multiple characters with individual emotional behavours, but that turned out to be far to much work. Have fun playing this little prototype.

More about me: http://dennisrauscher.de
